ValidationRule.description: Ensure that if a Payroll Number is provided then Start Date is also provided, and vice versa. Do this only where Email Address is not provided
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c = FALSE, ISBLANK(Email_Address__c), OR( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Payroll_Number__c)), ISBLANK(Start_Date__c) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Start_Date__c)), ISBLANK(Payroll_Number__c) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure that both a Payroll Number and a Start Date are provided.
